Key Match Events: Pakistan won by 3 wickets (with 7 balls remaining)
Post-Match Reflections: Shaheen Shah Afridi was named Player of the Match
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at Central Broward Regional Park Stadium Turf Ground, Lauderhill
Others: The match was part of the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2024, and Pakistan earned 2 points while Ireland earned 0
